comments:
I tried to integrate the WebViewerExample in birt_runtime to my Jboss. I have done this according to the instructions in http://www.eclipse.org/birt/phoenix/deploy/viewerSetup.php#jboss.
But when i click the ViewExample link, i'm getting this error..

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'm using
  - Eclipse 3.2
  - Jboss 4.0.1
  - Microsoft SQL server
  - Birt 2.1.0

please check out 142351 to see if it solves this issue.

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=142351

please let us if the solution in 

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=142351

workd for you.
Problem is solved when axis-ant.jar and axis.jar files copied to jboss. But i think this should be added in the web site so that no one else will face the same problem.
